Simulation

Class Particles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      • Simulation.Max
        • Simulation.Simulation
          • Simulation.Particles

  • public class Particles
extends Simulation
    Particles is a max instatiable object that is responsible for the particles system simulation. This class initialise needed objects and route messages to determine what action to do for each known message.

    • Method Detail

      • bang

        protected void bang()
        Routine when a bang message occurs on first inlet. For each update, this method retrieve the fluidSolver attributes (if applyFluidForce is enabled), update the particlesSystem and output the particles positions matrix.
        Overrides:
        bang in class com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
        See Also:
        ParticlesSystem

      • anything

        protected void anything(java.lang.String message,
            com.cycling74.max.Atom[] args)
        Routine when something other than a bang message occurs. Execute appropriates routines for known messages (on appropriate inlet). Call first Simulation.TreatMessage. Call Max.unknownMessage if the message is unknown.
        Overrides:
        anything in class com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
        Parameters:
        message - Max's header message
        args - Max's parameters message

      • applyBlob

        protected void applyBlob(int index,
             Vector position)
        Define whatever to do when a blob occurs. In this case, blob forces and erase events are transmitted to the particlesSystem.
        Specified by:
        applyBlob in class Simulation
        Parameters:
        index - Blob's index
        position - Position on which blob occurs

      • applyFluid

        public Vector applyFluid(Vector position)
        Get the current fluid force on the given position
        Parameters:
        position - Position of the point which feels the fluid
        Returns:
        The current fluid force applied to the givent point
